messages.message:
Ideas that have been suggested by folks here include:

• Whether a change to ACL could have a snag in it (unsure if we've made a change)
• Whether the recent privileged/unprivileged container switch could be related (but the problem seems conditioned on specific folder being accessed, so this seems unlikely)
• Whether the recent PY2/PY3 switch could be related (but again, seems unlikely since the problem seems conditioned on the folder being accessed)
Karthik is about to take a look at the `file-tservice` logs with them to see if we can figure anything out down there.
@Heymian for triage. She will know this the best
Please send specific logs and repro steps

Org: `POC`
Repo: `Rukesh_POS`
User: `1241099`
Folder: `OCR Word/workflow`
Cluster: `NP1`
Steps to reproduce:

• Attempt to create a file
• Attempt to delete a step from a flow
• Attempt to modify a file

Gopu believes it is a unicode issue, related to folders with spaces in the names. @Karthik S says that @Ashish and the infra team are familiar with this issue so it sounds as if the good news is that this maps to a known situation.

I'll stop spamming the engineering channel and send to the SC channel instead.

Also should support be looped into this as well btw? -- (perhaps we can make as a future topic) but would be good to establish a process that will scale on this one.

What we're doing work for now though! Just a comment to be parked for the future

Some context on this:

1. Today, SC completed software updates on NP1.
2. As part of the update, they updated all services.
3. They also had to perform a db migration.
4. They also had a bug with file service that we patched.
Will love to see the logs.
